body.name: PurSteam Portable Travel Steamer for Clothes - Leak Proof Design, Fast Heating, Auto Shutoff

byLineInfo.name: Visit the PurSteam World's Best Steamers Store

features: Why Is This The Best Handheld Steamer On The Market? – Our new InfaTherm heating system will heat in 25 seconds and provide 10 continuous minutes of wrinkle busting steam with less spilling and more safety than any other steamer. Gently iron all your clothes, curtains, sheets, and more. You will easily sterilize, refresh and clean all in one. Take it with you wherever you go and this multi-purpose steamer will not let you down.

Powerful & Gentle - The only travel steamer on the market with BPA free ABS/PP. Our unique and lightweight design prevents the steamer form tipping or spilling water. The water tank holds up to 4 fl oz/ 130ml of tap water, giving you up to 10 minutes to enjoy steaming even the most delicate fabrics.

Wrinkle Eraser - Running late? Ready in just 90 SECONDS, you can take out even the toughest wrinkles in no time. This steamer will de-wrinkle and sanitize not only your clothes but curtains & drapery, tablecloths, bedding, upholstery, toys and much more.

Safe & Secure - No more worrying when you run out of water during steaming. When the water tank is empty the steamer will automatically SHUT-OFF, preventing the unit from overheating and keeping you safe. Comes with a long power cord, therefore, we recommend not using an extension cord.
Superior Value/ Customer Service – We are a veteran owned 2nd generation family business and depend on happy customers. You get our full satisfaction warranty and LIVE telephone customer support.
body.description: Easy to use Get crisp, wrinkle-free clothes in just a few minutes with this reliable, lightweight steamer. Built for both speed and convenience, this handheld steamer is perfect for quick touch ups at home or while on the go. Ready to steam in 90 seconds Extra long 8-ft cord for convenience Works across all fabrics, including linen and silk Equipped with auto-shut off

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy fill, easy empty Say goodbye to inconvenient messes and spills with our 3.5 inch wide-mouth design. Built for busy people who want quick results, top up for your travel partner in seconds and be ready to steam in < 2 minutes. Safety first Ever worry about leaving your appliances on? Well, this isn’t one of them. Complete with auto-shut off, this steamer has an internal timer which protects against overheating after every use. Now that’s what we call peace of mind. Wrinkles don’t stand a chance. Don’t let this steamer’s size fool you. Fortified by a powerful, high temperature speed flow, this petite-sized steamer can smooth out even the most stubborn of kinks using our sophisticated, controlled steam release system.

Usage Tips Plug in your steamer and fill it (up to 4oz) with filtered water. Wait 90 seconds for it to heat. From there, hold the steamer at a distance of 1-2 inches from your chosen item. This will allow it to maintain its shape, while all wrinkles are smoothed out. Easy to use Get crisp, wrinkle-free clothes in just a few minutes with this reliable, lightweight steamer. Built for both speed and convenience, this handheld steamer is perfect for quick touch ups at home or while on the go. Ready to steam in 90 seconds Extra long 8-ft cord for convenience Works across all fabrics, including linen and silk Equipped with auto-shut off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Value for money, easy to use, recommended for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I specifically bought this steamer to travel with. It’s lightweight and small. Perfect to pack in a suitcase or carry on. I’m going on a 2 week vacation next week so I tested it out. It works great. It heats up super fast and does a great job. The only downside is that it’s very small so I got only 4 pieces of clothing steamed in one sitting. The water compartment is small so it only steams 3-4 pieces at a time. But that’s not a problem for me since I wanted something small and lightweight for travel. It’s a great purchase and I wish I bought it many years earlier for traveling purposes. Also be very careful with it because it will burn you if you’re not careful and do not leave it out if you have little kids. II find it easier to use if you hand your clothing on a hanger so you won’t burn yourself and that way you can keep the steamer in an upright position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's rare for me to give five stars, but this streamer works great. Bought it to steam new curtains but my son had wrinkles on a shirt and needed them out quickly. This steam got them out quicker than setting up and iron and ironing board. Easy to add water and heats up very quickly. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, easy & small
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t leak, small enough to pack in a suitcase without taking up space, & very quick to get wrinkles out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hated ironing. My New Friend
reviews.reviewText: I haven't owned an iron in years but, some of the clothes I have to wear for work are a bit wrinkled. I bought my son a big steamer and he loved it so I thought about a handheld one for me. This is EXCELLENT. I can plug it in before I shower and steam my shirt to be ready for the day. I've steamed bulky sweaters, shirts, t-shirts, and pants within minutes. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but attachments fall apart
reviews.reviewText: This thing is pretty great. I was able to clean up two very crumpled and dog hair covered wool pea coats, and a formal gown, as well as the dry cleaners would have within about two hours. However, the lint brush attachment that goes on the front of the steamer completely fell apart before I was even finished with one item. It’s unfortunate because it was really helpful in pulling off some hair and little “pilled up” bits of fabric.I like this steamer, it would be a perfect device if the attachments were more sturdy and maybe 1-2oz more in the water compartment so you can really get an entire item steamed/cleaned/dewrinkled with only one filling, rather than having to add more water 3/4 if the way through.I was impressed with how quickly it heats up, how easy it is to use, and how well it worked on my items I did not have time to take to the cleaners.Overall good, but could use some improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My honest review!!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for a summer cruise and it worked great! Not a wrinkle in site after use. I had my friends ask, “what’s the name of that steamer you brought on the vacation, I wanna buy that same exact one”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: Great steamer, had to refill a couple of times while using, but was great, very portable and easy to use.
This handheld clothes steamer is worth having, it’s simple and gets the job done.
Muy practica, caliente muy rápido , fácil de usar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good hot steam working very well
Très pratique, surtout pour les vêtements neuf en ligne, défroisse très bien
reviews.reviewText: Très pratique, surtout pour les vêtements neuf en ligne, défroisse très bien. Pratique aussi pour les endroits difficile d'accès avec le fer à repasser traditionnel. Bon réservoir pour l'eau,

The order arrived on time. I followed the instructions to use it on a test cloth to ensure it doesn't have anything to mark the fabric. The product does produce hot steam but it doesn't remove creases/crinkles as advertised. It is better than an iron but not as good as hoped.
